mapper.insert: insert into refresh_token (id, token_id, access_token, expires_at) values ( #{refreshToken.id}, #{refreshToken.token.id}, #{refreshToken.accessToken}, #{refreshToken.expiresAt} )
mapper.select: select refresh_token.id, refresh_token.token_id, refresh_token.access_token, refresh_token.revoked, refresh_token.expires_at, refresh_token.created_at from refresh_token where refresh_token.token_id = #{tokenId}

select refresh_token.id, refresh_token.token_id, refresh_token.access_token, refresh_token.revoked, refresh_token.expires_at, refresh_token.created_at,
token.id as token_id, token.token as token_token, token.revoked as token_revoked, token.grant_type as token_grant_type, token.expires_at as token_expires_at, token.created_at as token_created_at,
token_scope.id as token_ts_id, token_scope.token_id as token_ts_token_id, token_scope.created_at as token_ts_created_at, token_scope.updated_at as token_ts_updated_at,
scope.id as token_ts_scope_id, scope.name as token_ts_scope_name, scope.created_at as token_ts_scope_created_at,
lead_token.id as token_lead_token_id, lead_token.revoked as token_lead_token_revoked, lead_token.grant_type as token_lead_token_grant_type, lead_token.client_id as token_lead_token_client_id, lead_token.expires_at as token_lead_token_expires_at, lead_token.created_at as token_lead_token_created_at
from refresh_token join token on token.id = refresh_token.token_id join token_scope on token_scope.token_id = token.id join scope on scope.id = token_scope.scope_id
left join token_lead_token tlt on tlt.token_id = token.id left join token lead_token on lead_token.id = tlt.lead_token_id
where refresh_token.access_token = decode(#{accessToken}, 'escape') and refresh_token.revoked = FALSE and refresh_token.expires_at > current_timestamp and token.revoked = FALSE and token.expires_at < current_timestamp and token.client_id = #{clientId}
mapper.update: update refresh_token set revoked = true from token, auth_code_token, auth_code where token.id = refresh_token.token_id and auth_code_token.token_id = token.id and auth_code.id = auth_code_token.auth_code_id and auth_code.id = #{authCodeId}
